text: Manco is a male name. It may refer to: ==History== * Manco Capac, the founder of the Inca civilization in Cusco ("KOOZ-Koh") in the early 13th century * Manco Inca Yupanqui (1516 â€“ 1544), founder and monarch of the independent Neo- Inca State in Vilcabamba, originally a puppet Inca Emperor of the Spaniards ==Entertainment== * Manco, the nickname of the Man with No Name, a character in the film For a Few Dollars More ==Business== * Manco Inc., manufacturer of Duck Tape brand products, now a part of Shurtape Technologies
title: Manco
